title: Heightened mitochondrial respiration in CF cells is normalised by triple CFTR modulator therapy through mechanisms involving calcium
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): H.H. Jarosz-Griffiths, L.R. Caley, S. Lara-Reyna, S. Savic, I.J. Clifton, M.F. McDermott, D.G. Peckham
